mod.description: Spore UI Fixer Framework Spore UI Fixer Framework is a mod that fixes numerous issues present in Spore's Graphics User Interface, rebalances UI motions for the 60 FPS fix, contains alternative UI scales for editors and the sporepedia, and provides a basis for other mods to modify the UI more effectively. Requires UPE. More details, and modder's resources can be found on the mod's Github page.

component.description: Does not change the scale of the editor palettes.
Rescales the editor palettes to take up less screen space at higher resolutions.
Rescales the editor palettes to take up the least screen space at higher resolutions.
Rescales the communications window in the Civ and Space stages to be larger and prioritize the creature viewport. Intended for use at medium to high resolutions.
Rescales the Sporepedia to display its cards and interface slightly larger. Intended for use at medium to high resolutions.
Rescales the Adventure Editor palettes to take up less screen space at higher resolutions.
